'''Heribald Bolger''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Heribald was the second son of [[Wilibald Bolger]] and [[Prisca Baggins]]. He was present at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>

== Etymology ==
''Heribald'' is an Old German name, derived from the elements ''heri'' "army" and ''bald'' "bold, brave".
